DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether treatment single 800mg dose AZD9056 , medication develop possible treatment Rheumatoid Arthritis , effect function retina
DOC.brief_title: Cross-over Study Investigate Retinal Function Following Administration Single Dose AZD9056
DOC.criteria: Volunteers must able undergo Electroretinography assessment Volunteers must intra ocular pressure le 25mmHg 6/6 vision Volunteers must pass test assess whether risk narrow angle glaucoma Volunteers must family history colour blindness , must also pass colour blindness test Volunteers must history current neurological opthalmological ( eye ) disease
